sentences.sContent: ...What does the man say about the Italian woman working in Manchester...
...It was an immigrant town; white Piedmont was Italian and Irish...
...Do you think you could pop through in bringing me up-to-date on their arrangements for the Italian trip...
...there is a flight to Lenarty Airport which leaves at six thirty London time and gets in at eight thirty Italian time...

trans.tranOther: relating to Italy, its people, or its language
